subject: HDI kill the "AWT-Windows" thread?
msgSnippet: Does anyone know how to get rid of the AWT-Windows thread? Interrupting it doesn t work and I don t want to System.exit() for a number of reasons. My team
messageBody:
Does anyone know how to get rid of the "AWT-Windows" thread?
Interrupting it doesn't work and I don't want to System.exit() for
a number of reasons.

My team runs junit (junit.textui.testrunner) from JBuilder and also
from Ant. This thread is hanging out and preventing the tests from
finishing completely.

We used to avoid doing anything GUI related in the tests (because of
this thread), but now we want to do more and this problem is cramping
our style.

THANKS
